intervention_catalogue.name: Creating Positive Connections
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Creating Positive Connections supports desistance by helping men on probation understand the benefits of social networks and develop their sense of connection.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
This toolkit is designed to support desistance by enabling conversations in supervision that will help men on probation: 
* understand social capital and its benefits
* identify their networks
* develop their confidence and feel a sense of connection
